text: Leenesh Mattoo is an Indian television actor known for his portrayal of Rudra Singh Oberoi in Star Plus's Ishqbaaaz. ==Career== Mattoo made his television debut with Star Plus's Suhani Si Ek Ladki as Anuj Birla.http://www.filmibeat.com/television/news/2016/ishqbaaz-kunal-jaisingh- and-leenesh-mattoo-down-with-dengue-249814.html He next portrayed Rudra Singh Oberoi in Ishqbaaaz, his second consecutive collaboration with Star Plus. ==Television== {| class="wikitable sortable " !Year !Show !Role !References |- |2014–2016 |Suhani Si Ek Ladki |Anuj Birla | |- |2016–2018 |Ishqbaaaz |rowspan="2"|Rudra Singh Oberoi | |- |2017 |Dil Boley Oberoi | |- |2020 |Bhalla Calling Bhalla |Sahil Bhalla | |} ==Awards and nominations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Show !! Result |- | 2018 | Gold Awards | Most Fit Actor (Male) | | |- | 2019 | Indian Telly Awards | Best Actor In Comic Role (Popular) |Ishqbaaaz | |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:Male actors from Mumbai Category:Indian male soap opera actors Category:Male actors in Hindi television Category:1992 births
title: Leenesh Mattoo
